attributes.action: make it a legal requirement for all muslims who enter the UK to swear an oath of allegiance to Britiain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea behind this is that if Muslims are coming to the Unitied Kingdom to live and work then the UK must be a better country from were they are coming.  So swearing and oath of allegiance would legally bind them to integrate with British Citizens and to contribute financially to the economy.  And to make it a deportation offence to incite racial hatred and to the burning of flags and effigies on UK streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
